scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && npx react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform android --dev false --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.bundle:ios: npx react-native bundle --entry-file index.ts --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.bundle:all: npm run bundle:android && npm run bundle:ios
